SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE (#{role} IS NULL OR role = #{role}) AND (#{email} IS NULL OR email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')) AND withdraw = FALSE

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM borrow WHERE user_id = u.id AND status != 'RETURNED') AS borrowCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM borrow WHERE user_id = u.id AND status = 'RETURNED') AS returnCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE user_id = u.id AND status != 'CANCELLED') AS reservationCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review WHERE user_id = u.id) AS reviewCount FROM user u WHERE u.email = #{email}
